text:
Dear Nikolay, 

 

Could you please tell me what specific error/message do your colleagues encounter when trying to access the bank account? This way I can go into more detail with BCR regarding this issue.

 

Thank you and looking forward to your reply.

 

Best,

 

Cosmin Todirașcu

Attorney-at-law |

Sent: Monday, January 29, 2024 5:43 PM
To: Cosmin T <cosmin.t@almaj.eu>
Cc: Alice I <alice.i@almaj.eu>; Office <office@tibiel.com>; Vania <vania.milcheva@gmail.com>; ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД <tbl_ood@abv.bg>
Subject: RE: Pending topics TIBIEL EOOD - BCR / ANRE / BRM / TransGaz 

 

Dear Cosmin,

 

Kindly be informed that our accounting team still does not have access to the bank account at the BCR. 

 

Regarding the requested documents and information, I will revert to you in the following days.

 

Best regards,

 

Nikolay

 

From: Cosmin T <cosmin.t@almaj.eu <mailto:cosmin.t@almaj.eu> > 
Sent: Monday, January 29, 2024 5:14 PM
To: Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com <mailto:n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com> >
Cc: Alice I <alice.i@almaj.eu <mailto:alice.i@almaj.eu> >; Office <office@tibiel.com <mailto:office@tibiel.com> >; Vania <vania.milcheva@gmail.com <mailto:vania.milcheva@gmail.com> >; ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД <tbl_ood@abv.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@abv.bg> >
Subject: RE: Pending topics TIBIEL EOOD - BCR / ANRE / BRM / TransGaz 

 

Dear Nikolay,

 

We have inquired about the issue with the bank account and BCR have assured us that no action has been taken against TIBIEL’s bank account. Could you please provide us with an update on this? Is it still impossible for you to access the bank account?

 

BCR have also confirmed that no additional documents shall be needed for the UBO update, except the attached Statement.

*the document is bilingual, so the English version is also available in brackets in each section

 

Therefore, I kindly ask you to help us with the information required in the following sections:

 

(i)               “Statement regarding the identity of the beneficial owner” – additional information required concerning Mrs. Antoniou; unfortunately the scanned copy of the ID is quite difficult to read and we want to make sure the data is correct.

 

(ii)             “Information regarding the source of wealth of the beneficial owner”

 

Please send us the Statement for final review before having it signed my Mr. Ivanov as legal representative of the company – the Statement may be signed electronically. 

 

Kind regards,

 

Cosmin Todirașcu

Attorney-at-law |

Subject: RE: Pending topics TIBIEL EOOD - BCR / ANRE / BRM / TransGaz 

 

Dear Cosmin,

 

Kindly find attached the document hand signed by the external lawyer.

 

Also attached, please find the following documents that are mentioned in the Dreft confirmation:

 

1.	Certificate from the commercial register for Lifond Investments Limited
2.	Certificate from the commercial register for Alackon Limited
3.	Additional tax certificate for Lifond
4.	Additional tax certificate for Alackon
5.	Additional memorandum Lifond
6.	Additional memorandum Alackon 
7.	Passport and ID card of the UBO Ala Antoniou 
8.	Additional tax certificate for Ala Antoniou 
9.	Passport and ID card of the Sole Director of TIBIEL Dimitar Ivanov
10.	Two signed versions of the company ownership structure
11.	Article of association
12.	Extract of the commercial register for TIBIEL EOOD
13.	Good standing certificate for TIBIEL EOOD
14.	Decision for the appointment of the Director 

 

If you need anything else, please let me know!

 

Best regards,

 

Nikolay

Dear Nikolay,

 

Please find attached the Address containing my comments.

 

I kindly ask you to send me the document for final review, after filling in the information as per my comments.

 

Also, please take note that in case the option is the address from an external source, TIBIEL is required to:

 

*	mention the documents based on which the shareholding structure, the beneficiaries and the way the verifications were carried out;
*	enclose the complete shareholder’s structure.

 

 

Kind regards,

Cosmin

Please note that the following topics are still pending and require immediate attention:
